column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I can see how some people would say it's too expensive
column2: but I like to think you're paying for the experience. The outdoor seating is fantastic and the place just has a life to it.  I liked the noise
column3: I liked the action...it's tapas with a decent bar (and insane Sangria)
column4: that's what you should be looking for.  We were seated quickly
column5: and our waiter was informative and helpful.
